answer_key.q_text: Which place is the digit "0" in the number 4063?
answer_key.a: hundreds place - some students may write it as '100s'
LOs: Be able to identify the place value of digits in a number.
Sum of two 2-digit numbers with carry-over
Sum of two 2-digit numbers with carry-over
Sum of two 3-digit numbers with carry-over

answer_key.answer_explanation: The missing addend is the number that needs to be added to 35 to get 50. In this case, it is 15.
LOs: Find the missing addend in a 2-digit addition problem

answer_key.answer_explanation: Addition is commutative, meaning the order of the numbers does not matter.
LOs: Understand the commutative property of addition

answer_key.q_text: Which method is useful when adding 287 + 465 quickly? Circle the correct option.
answer_key.answer_explanation: Regrouping is necessary when the sum of the digits in a column exceeds 9, requiring a carry to the next column.
LOs: Awareness of the concept of regrouping in addition

answer_key.q_text: Circle all statements that are correct.
answer_key.a: Options (a), (b), and (c) are correct. All of them must be selected.
LOs: Understand the values of positive and negative numbers on the number line
Understand the concept of equality and inequalities
